think_procedure: 1. Identify the function of the 'temp_buffers' knob in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine if it has any special values such as -1 or 0 that indicate different behavior. 3. Conclude if 'temp_buffers' qualifies as a 'special knob' based on the presence of these special values and their impact.
